text: Viktor Nikolayevich Myasnikov () (born 3 September 1948) is a retired hurdler who represented the USSR. He won two medals at the European Indoor Championships. Myasnikov trained at Dynamo in Minsk. ==Achievements== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%;" !Year !Tournament !Venue !Result !Extra |- |1976 |European Indoor Championships |Munich, West Germany |style="background-color:gold" align="center" | 1st |60 m hurdles |- |1977 |European Indoor Championships |San Sebastián, Spain |bgcolor="silver" align="center" | 2nd |60 m hurdles |} ==References== ==External links== * *Sports Reference Category:Russian male hurdlers Category:Soviet male hurdlers Category:Dynamo sports society athletes Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic athletes of the Soviet Union Category:1948 births Category:Living people
title: Viktor Myasnikov
